He ran.

en: He did not get up early.
He does not get up early.

He was granted permission to go home early.

en: He watched the horse race using his binoculars.

en: He is barren of creative spirit.

en: He tried to appeal.
He has poor ability to organize.
He met a nice young man.

en: He's misunderstood because of his vulgar language.

en: He is content with the simple life.

He headed for the door at full speed.

He never seems to grow older.

en: He is anything but honest.

en: He was covered with mud from head to foot.

en: He was covered in mud from head to foot.
zh: 他从头到脚都沾满了泥。

en: He was an example of a popular athlete in his days.

en: He gave body and soul to his job.

en: He is attention itself.

en: He was respected both as a teacher and as a man.

en: Is he a teacher?

en: He used to be a man of fortune.

en: He is not as well off as he used to be.

en: He is not so diligent as he used to be.

en: He does not work so hard as he used to.

en: He doesn't work as hard as he used to.

en: He used to be a nice boy.
